 Promotion for recharge account/ Fast-pay on 12/2012 (the 1 st time) 1. Eligible subscribers : Pre-paid subscribers (active, inactive, at the time of keeping subscription; in the first 10 top up - will be considered as one time) , postpaid subscribers transfer to prepaid subscribers , top-up. . Post paid subscribers (include subscribers which use the Gold plan ; professional, assigned, tested subscribers and internal customer’s subscribers ) top-up via Fast-pay system. NOT APPLICABLE for subscribers which are: Joining on-net call VNPT promotions. Joining other promotions for business customers If customer had joined VNPT promotion, but they also canceled it. After that, they top-up via Fast-pay: If regulation of VNPT cancel command validate immediately, customer allows joining Fast-pay promotion in that cycle If regulation of VNPT cancel command validate in next cycle, customer does not allow joining Fast-pay promotion . 2. Benefits : a. Pre-paid : Additional 50% top-up credits Unlimited times of top-up and value of scratch-cards Note : VND 0 packages (in the first 10 top up) are still applicable for additional 100% promotion (50% online, 50% offline) . Top-up card Bonus KM2 credit (25%) KM3 credit (25%) VND 5.000 VND 1.250 VND 1.250 VND 10.000 VND 2.500 VND 2.500 VND 20.000 VND 5.000 VND 5.000 VND 30.000 VND 7.500 VND 7.500 VND 50.000 VND 12.500 VND 12.500 VND 100.000 VND 25.000 VND 25.000 VND 200.000 VND 50.000 VND 50.000 VND 300.000 VND 75.000 VND 75.000 VND 500.000 VND 125.000 VND 125.000 b. Post paid: additional 50% paying bill via Fast-pay. Regulations : Using the bonus credit for on net-call and SMS only Period of validity: in top up period only (will be lost after top up period) . Customer will not get benefits of this promotion if you are recharged your balance by another Fast pay account. c. Notes : Applicable for recharging by recharge’s code/ scratch cards via website/ wapsite http:// naptien.mobifone.com.vn If access via http://www.mobifone.com.vn > chose Tiện ích online> Thanh toán onlin e : Chose Nạp tiền bằng thẻ cào >> automatic link to the website http://n aptien.mobifone.com.vn >> enter the code and top up: Allow joining the promotion of 3 golden days Chose Thanh toán cước/ Nạp tiền trực tuyến >> automatic link to Smartlink system >> enter the bank account, top-up value...>> deduct from customer’s bank account: Do not allow joining 3 golden days. . 3. Time of promotion: From 05/12/2012 to 07/12/2012 2012&#24180;12&#26376;&#20805;&#20540; &#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160;&#65288;&#31532;&#19968;&#27425;&#65289; 1.&#20248;&#24800;&#23545;&#35937;: &#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948;: &#49440;&#48520; &#52649;&#51204; ( &#49324;&#50857;&#54616;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46108; Fastpay &#53685;&#54616;&#50668; &#52649;&#51204;&#54624; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; ( GOLD &#54056;&#53556; , &#44277;&#47924;&#50896; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;, &#45236;&#48512; &#50629;&#47924; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#46321; &#54252;&#54632;) . &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46108; &#44221;&#50864; : VNPT &#45236;&#48512; &#45348;&#53944;&#50892;&#53356;&#50640; &#47924;&#47308; &#53685;&#54868; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54616;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#46308; &#49324;&#50629;&#45824;&#49345;&#51032; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54616;&#45716; &#49324;&#50629; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#46308; &#47564;&#51068; &#50696;&#51204;&#50640; VNPT &#45236;&#48512; &#45348;&#53944;&#50892;&#53356;&#50640; &#47924;&#47308; &#53685;&#54868; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54620;&#45936; &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54980; &#45796;&#51020;&#50640; fastpay&#47196; &#52649;&#51204;&#54620; &#44221;&#50864;: VNPT &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#47484; &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54952;&#47141;&#51060; &#48148;&#47196; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#45817;&#44592;&#50640; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. VNPT &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#47484; &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54952;&#47141;&#51060; &#45796;&#51020; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796;. 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#45236;&#50857;: a. &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#52649;&#51204; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036;&#46041;&#50504; &#52649;&#51204;&#54616;&#47732; &#52649;&#51204;&#44552;&#50529;&#51032; 50% &#47484; &#52628;&#44032; &#51648;&#44553;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796;. &#52649;&#51204; &#44552;&#50529; &#48143; &#52649;&#51204;&#54943;&#49688;&#45716; &#51228;&#54620;&#51060; &#50630;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796; . &#50976;&#51032;: &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#50630;&#45716; &#49352; &#44032;&#51077; &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#52649;&#51204;&#54624; &#46412; &#52649;&#51204; &#44552;&#50529;&#51032; 100%&#47484; &#52628;&#44032; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. 10 &#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;- &#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6026;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;), &#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6036;&#6098;&#6026;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6085;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;, &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6100; Gold ,​ &#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; &#6036;&#6081;&#6047;&#6016;&#6023;&#6035;,&#6023;&#6086;&#6035;&#6070;&#6025;&#6070;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6033;&#6076;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;, &#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6032;&#6082;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6083;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; N ạp tiền bằng thẻ cào >> &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6047;&#6098;&#6044;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6071; link &#6033;&#6085; web http://n aptien.mobifone.com.vn >> &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6102;
